title: Tesco Grocery Scraper
description: Scrape product data from Tesco.com by providing search keywords, URLs, or product IDs.

queries.title: Queries
queries.description: Enter search keywords, product/category URLs, or product IDs (e.g., '303837409' for info, '303837409/reviews' for reviews).

region.title: Region
region.description: Select the region to scrape from.

maxItems.title: Maximum Items
maxItems.description: The maximum number of products to scrape per query. Leave empty to scrape all available products.

includeProductDetails.title: Include Full Product Details
includeProductDetails.description: If enabled, the scraper will fetch detailed information for each product found in a category or search. Slower but more comprehensive.

includeReviews.title: Include Product Reviews
includeReviews.description: If enabled, the scraper will fetch customer reviews for each product. Only works when includeProductDetails is true.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.
